Seino, this is Juice-Juice.
We, Juice-Juice, have decided to release a new single.
It will be released on July 12.
Fly! The Bride is a song about the complicated feelings of a girl.
With lyrics that depict pain, hardship, and emotions,
The dance is rather intense, so I hope you enjoy the dance as well.
I hope you enjoy the dance as well. We are currently shooting a music video for Pride Pride.

I'm really looking forward to it.

Juice-Juice 10th Anniversary Concert Tour Juice!Juice at BUDOKAN on May 29,
Juice! Juice at BUDOKAN on May 29th, we will perform our new song "Pride Bright" for the first time.
I am very happy.
How do you like it, Mr. Ishikawa?
Yes, I am. I am very happy to perform the new song for the first time,
I would like to make the BUDOKAN concert a wonderful one,
I would be very happy if you could come to the show.
Thank you very much. I hope you will come to the show. Thank you very much.
That's all for Juice-Juice.
Hello! Stay, this time with Shori Nishida of BEYOOOOONDS' Chica Tetsu and Miyo Hirai of BEYOOOOONDS' Seasonings.
These two will be presenting this time, so please stay with us until the end.
Now that Golden Week is over, I am sure many of you are back to your normal mode.
We had a lot of work and tours during the Golden Week holidays, but what would you like to do if you had a holiday weekend?
If you had a consecutive holiday, what would you like to do?
Well, recently we have been talking about going on a trip together, and we were wondering where we would like to go.
We are from Kyoto, so it's not easy to say we want to go sightseeing in Kyoto.
We haven't really been to Kyoto because we're both from Kyoto.
If there is such an opportunity, I would like to go there.
I hope we can go there together more and more.
BEYOOOOONDS will be performing with an orchestra at the Tokyo Metropolitan Art Space Concert Hall on May 2nd.
BEYOOOOONDS had a biophonic performance with an orchestra at the Tokyo Metropolitan Art Space Concert Hall on May 2!
Yay!
Yes, yes!
But, you see, this recording is taking place right before the biophonic concert.
That's right.
I can't tell you how I feel about it yet, but...
The other day, we had a rehearsal for the biophonic concert and choreographed a new song that will be performed for the first time at the biophonic concert.
I can't stop being excited about it. I really like the new song.
I really like the new song, too. I think it's sparkling and fits the Beyonc√© worldview, and I hope many people will listen to it.
I hope many people will listen to it. The choreography is full of highlights, so I hope people will pay attention to that too,
I hope many people will listen to it. Thank you very much.

This is Shiori Nishida from BEYOOOOONDS' Chica Tetsu and Miyo Hirai from BEYOOOOONDS' Seasonings, and we're here at Halo! I'm going to ask you a few questions, so don't think too much and just answer at a quick pace.
The temperature is getting warmer and warmer, but what is your personal favorite item to coordinate for this season?
What is your new favorite thing right now?
Video Editing What is the workout that Mio Hirai is focusing on right now?

Power Project is celebrating its 25th anniversary this year Which song would Mio Hirai like to dance on stage at least once? 7 korobi yataki 7 korobi yataki oo by Angeleum! Yes, thank you!

Looks like a good fit.

I thought it was very rare to have such a format, and I saw a video of Hikako Sasaki dancing by herself on Youtube, and it was so cool that I wanted to dance someday.
I think it's wonderful and I'd like to see it someday, so please do your best.
I'm not sure if it's because of the Japanese, but I think it's because of the NeoBio concert.
I don't know if you have Japanese, but there is a part in the concert called "Neovio" where I do the mc.
I was always saying "ah-ha-hi", but after the third or fourth time, I started to be able to mc a little more calmly, and I thought that was the latest growth.
It was really difficult for me to sing and speak in a normal way because I had been dancing and doing my best up to that point.
But you did a great job.
Thank you very much.
I think I am growing.
Thank you very much.

We are Shiori Nishida from BEYOOOOONDS Subway and Miyo Hirai from BEYOOOOONDS Seasonings. Stay!

Now we are in the second half of the BEYOOOOONDS concert tour NEOBIO, which started in March. This tour is called NEOBIO, and we are trying our best to show you a new BEYOOOOONDS, but what kind of tour is it?
Well, we didn't put a lot of emphasis on each member's specialties, but this time you will be able to enjoy them as well.
You've got it.
Yes! Of course, we put a lot of thought into the singing voices and the composition of the songs, so I think you will enjoy it.
I'm surprised that it's already the second half of the season.
I'm sure you'll enjoy it, but I'm surprised that it's already the second half of the season.
I'm sure you will be even more enthusiastic about this second show at the Nippon Budokan, but was there anything memorable about the first show?
One of the most memorable moments was when BEYOOOOONDS came out for encore and we were all able to wear the sparkling fluffy skirt costumes that we had dreamed of wearing together.
I've been allowed to wear many outfits in the past,
But until now, we had been allowed to wear a lot of costumes, but most of them were colorful and chaotic, and the members wore them separately,
But we were all allowed to wear super cute costumes with fluffy skirts,
I was really happy about that, and it left a lasting impression on me.
Yes, at this point we are gradually getting to know what the Nippon Budokan concert will be like,
We are sure that everyone will really enjoy the concert, so let's meet at the Nippon Budokan! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

This message is brought to you by Shori Nishida of BEYOOOOONDS Subway
BEYOOOOONDS Seasonings' Hirai Miyo presents Halo! Stay!
It's time to say goodbye!
Here's an announcement!
BEYOOOOONDS concert tour on May 15
NeoBio at Budokan will be held on May 15!
This will be the second time for us to perform at the Nippon Budokan,
The 12 of us will join forces and do our best, so please give us your support.
And we are now holding our spring tour, Beyond Concert Tour Neovio.
The next concert will be in Yamaguchi on May 20.
We will all enjoy ourselves as much as we can and bring you the best entertainment show.
We will definitely thrill you, so please look forward to it.
And now the fourth single,
Seek Me, Fate's Traveller, on the night sky where you can't even draw a dream.
If you haven't seen the music videos yet, please check them out,
If you haven't seen them yet, please take a look!
Haloste is a channel where the members of Hello Project appear on the show.
New videos are uploaded every Wednesday.
Please subscribe to our channel!

and Miyo Hirai from BEYOOOOONDS Seasonings.
